1. What do you notice?
I notice that all of the leagues depicted, except Major League Baseball, have a majority of players of color. I also notice that the percentage of head coaches of color are all under 50% in all these graphs.
2. What do you wonder?
I wonder why there aren’t more head coaches of color in these leagues. I also wonder why there isn't more diversity in Major League Baseball.
3. What impact does this have on you and your community?
I certainly didn’t know about the lack of diversity in head coaches of color in sports leagues. I now feel like I’m a little more aware of racism in sports. I feel inclined to do more research to further educate myself.
4. What’s going on in this graph? Write a catchy headline that captures the graph’s main idea.
“Is Diversity Out of Our League?”
ace_sentences: I notice that the graphs depict several leagues.
Major League Baseball is one of these leagues.
In every depicted league except Major League Baseball, a majority of players are players of color.
In all these graphs, the percentage of head coaches of color is under 50%.
I wonder why there are not more head coaches of color in these leagues.
I wonder why there is not more diversity in Major League Baseball.
Before I saw these graphs, I did not know about the lack of diversity among head coaches of color in sports leagues.
Now I feel more aware of racism in sports.
I feel inclined to do more research.
I want to educate myself further.
The headline is: Is diversity out of our league?
